title: Ep 95: Mommy Issues
description: After a transformative trip to the Midwest, I have a deep revelation about my mom. But it applies to all people who disappoint us or make us angry. What's the key to a good relationship? I'm not 100% sure but it has to do with having someone to lift weights with. Let's get our lives and get super deep on it all, bros!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
